com.architech.spm.services
Class QueryEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.architech.spm.services.QueryEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISpringHostedService
public class QueryEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpringHostedService

A service class that provides methods related to querying the aggregated metrics data. This service class is exposed using JAX-WS and is named SPM Query Engine in the application server.

Author:
nate

runQuery

public SPMQueryResponse runQuery(SPMQuery query)
Runs a single query and returns the results.

Parameters:
query - The query to exexute
Returns:
The query response

runQueryBatch

public java.util.ArrayList<SPMQueryResponse> runQueryBatch(java.util.ArrayList<SPMQuery> queries)
Runs multiple queries as a batch, and returns the results. The sequence ID on SPMQuery and SPMQueryResponse is important to track when using this method.

Parameters:
queries - An array of SPMQuery transfer objects
Returns:
An array of SPMQueryResponse transfer objects
See Also:
SPMQueryResponse.sequence

listMetrics

public java.util.ArrayList<MetricDefinition> listMetrics()
